text: Where Are Your Children? is a 1943 American crime movie directed by William Nigh and starring Jackie Cooper, Gale Storm, Patricia Morrison, John Litel, Gertrude Michael, Anthony Warde, Addison Richards, Sarah Edwards, Betty Blythe. It was distributed by Monogram Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1943 crime movies Category:American crime movies Category:Movies directed by William Nigh
title: Where Are Your Children?
